plugins.name: claude-super-team
plugins.description: Structured project planning and execution workflow with phased delivery. Includes roadmap management, brainstorming with interactive and autonomous modes, phase planning with research/discussion/planning/execution loops, interactive coding sessions, autonomous full-pipeline build automation, progress tracking, quick phase insertion, security findings integration, hook-based telemetry capture, and interactive help system.

plugins.name: marketplace-utils
plugins.description: Manage and fix Claude Code plugin marketplaces -- audit for issues, register/remove plugins, update entries, sync versions, configure distribution, and maintain marketplace.json manifests. Includes skill scaffolding and release automation.

plugins.name: task-management
plugins.description: Task management integration for Linear and GitHub. Sync planning artifacts to Linear and manage GitHub issues with consistency standards.
